emails.subject: The countdown to December 15
emails.body:
Early Decision 2 and Early Action 2 Deadline Approaching

­
­
                        Hi Kieran,

                        With our final Early Decision and Early Action application deadline <https://www.depauw.edu/admission-aid/apply/?utm_campaign=apply&utm_content=ea2_3day&utm_medium=email&utm_source=slate&utm_term=fy> approaching this Monday, December 15, we hope you'll keep in mind the life-changing experience that awaits you at DePauw:                      

	                           A challenging liberal arts education (ranked 9th in the United States for innovation by U.S. News & World Report), home to both a pioneering School of Business & Leadership and interdisciplinary Creative School.                        
	                           Study abroad in over 100 countries (90% of DePauw students study abroad)                        
	                           Internships with companies like Eli Lilly, Salesforce and Microsoft (84% of students complete an internship; most DePauw students complete at least two)                         

                        Applying Early Decision or Early Action ensures you receive your admission decision by January 15, maximizes your scholarship opportunities, and allows you to apply to DePauw's prestigious Honor Scholar and Fellowship programs. 

                        We can't wait to see your application for admission <http://www.depauw.edu/admission-aid/apply/?utm_campaign=apply&utm_content=ea2_3day&utm_medium=email&utm_source=slate&utm_term=fy> soon, Kieran.
                                               
­
                        Mary Beth Petrie                      

                        Vice President for Enrollment Management                      


­

­
APPLY TODAY <https://www.depauw.edu/admission-aid/apply/?utm_campaign=apply&utm_content=ea2_3day&utm_medium=email&utm_source=slate&utm_term=fy>
admission@depauw.edu
(765) 658-4006 <tel:765-658-4006>

                        DePauw University Office of Admission                      

                        204 East Seminary Street                      

                        Greencastle, Indiana 46135                      


                              © 2025 DePauw University. All rights reserved.                            


This email was sent to jkgwnjk4@duck.com by DePauw University.
Unsubscribe from DePauw University. <https://apply.depauw.edu/go?r=optout&mid=1f804a19-38a8-47e1-8bbb-8a5847ea796c&utm_campaign=apply&utm_content=ea2_3day&utm_medium=email&utm_source=slate&utm_term=fy>

emails.subject: Hey Kieran, here's $500!
emails.body:
Attend a Fairmont State SOAR event and get a $500 renewable scholarship

Coming to your area! 

          Spend an evening with faculty and staff as we celebrate your Falcon Journey! All first-time freshmen who attend one of our upcoming SOAR scholarship award events will receive a $2,000 total scholarship ($500 per academic year for four total years) 

          To qualify, you must apply and be admitted to Fairmont State University for the Fall 2025 term AND you must be a first-time college student. 

          Click the button below to register for a SOAR event near you!         




REGISTER NOW <https://apply.fairmontstate.edu/portal/soar?utm_campaign=soar&utm_medium=email&utm_source=slate>




Questions? Reply to this email and an admissions representative will contact you.





Office of Admissions & Welcome Center
105 Turley Student Services Center
1201 Locust Avenue
Fairmont, West Virginia 26554

(800) 641-5678 <tel:1-800-641-5678>
(304) 367-4010 <tel:1-304-367-4010>
Recruit@FairmontState.edu <mailto:recruit@FairmontState.edu>

©2023 Fairmont State University
Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Institution







This email was sent to pulp-flint-maybe@duck.com by Fairmont State University Recruiting.
Fairmont State University, 1201 Locust Avenue Fairmont, WV 26554
Unsubscribe from Fairmont State University. <https://apply.fairmontstate.edu/go?r=optout&mid=7d84895f-d0a6-48bc-8015-6695eefa6563&utm_campaign=soar&utm_medium=email&utm_source=slate>

emails.subject: Lock in your exclusive perks! Apply by Jan. 15
emails.body:
We see a future Panther in you!

͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌  ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌  ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌  ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌  ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌  ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌  ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌  ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌  ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌  ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌  ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌  ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ ͏‌ 

[
https://learn.ohiodominicanu.org/f/r/37b1ec4660e2cf7b8faaf2b49?%3D&
]

Dear Kieran,

 

We think you'd be a great candidate for admission to Ohio Dominican
University, so we'd love to see you submit your Panther Priority
Application [
https://learn.ohiodominicanu.org/f/r/cabe7bb2096a40a1d84921335?%3D%3D&?utm_campaign=dl&utm_source=enroll360_apply&utm_medium=email&utm_content=apply&tnnt=4c71fc73-76a2-4f08-a062-d938ae63e8bb&UTM_rcrd=2bbad84f-1c59-4db9-95b5-cf522e0a3972
] before the January 15 deadline.

You've also earned a number of exclusive Panther Perks when you apply,
including:

* No application fee
* A quick admission decision
* Automatic scholarship consideration
* Optional submission of ACT/SAT scores

If you'd prefer to use the Common App, add us to your list of schools
[
https://learn.ohiodominicanu.org/f/r/2690c73eadddfc0145f7b52c3?&
] and we'll still honor your Panther Perks.

When you follow your passion, you're following the things that make
your life rich and your heart full. And no one can help you champion
your passions like ODU! We believe learning is about more than
listening to lectures or taking tests and quizzes. In fact, we offer
40+ undergraduate degree programs and are passionate about teaching
students how to think critically so they can explore and discover for
themselves.

 

Follow your passion—wherever it may lead. Submit your Panther
Priority Application [
https://learn.ohiodominicanu.org/f/r/cabe7bb2096a40a1d84921335?%3D%3D&?utm_campaign=dl&utm_source=enroll360_apply&utm_medium=email&utm_content=apply&tnnt=4c71fc73-76a2-4f08-a062-d938ae63e8bb&UTM_rcrd=2bbad84f-1c59-4db9-95b5-cf522e0a3972
] or the Common App [
https://learn.ohiodominicanu.org/f/r/2690c73eadddfc0145f7b52c3?&
] by the January 15 deadline.

 

Sincerely,

 

Undergraduate Admission
Griffin Student Center, Room 203
Ohio Dominican University
1216 Sunbury Rd.
Columbus, Ohio 43219
(614) 251-4500

Ohio Dominican University

1216 Sunbury Road
Columbus, Ohio 43219

We received your information from
NRCCUA with Encoura.

Browse to https://learn.ohiodominicanu.org/email/unsubscribe/693c62c79aca7971040653/jkgwnjk4@duck.com/f9eaaf0246161e7bcad54bd647099c81a690065c816a98f93f3f00845aa62cab to no longer receive emails from this company.

emails.subject: Kieran, now is the time to earn extra money for college!
emails.body:
Hi Kieran,As you get ready to take the next step after high school, one of the most important decisions you'll make is how to invest in your future—and Muskingum University is here to help you get the most out of it!

          We're thrilled to invite you to our Scholarship Days, an exclusive chance for accepted students like you to boost your initial scholarship and secure even more funding for your college experience. Take advantage of this opportunity to earn additional scholarships and make your Muskingum education even more affordable!

          In addition to earning extra money for college, Scholarship Days give you the opportunity to interact with faculty, staff, and current students. The dates for this year's events are January 24, February 21 and March 21 (virtual).

To qualify, all you need to do is submit your application <https://admission.muskingum.edu/apply>.  Once you are accepted for admission, we will notify you if you are eligible to attend.

        It's time to take the next step towards your future, and Muskingum University will support you every step. If you have any questions, contact me.

        Sincerely,

        Mason
____________________________________________
Mason Sprang
Admission Counselor
      Muskingum University
260 Stadium Drive, New Concord, OH 43762-1837
Office: 740-826-8137
Website <https://na01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.muskingum.edu%2F&data=02%7C01%7Cccrane%40Itctransco.com%7Cbaf944b17a484fd12b7608d67a257026%7C579de82f6a464bff92cdbf4459fc16cd%7C0%7C0%7C636830698574990353&sdata=4RvY15j0gxQj%2FFP2GVBNtw%2BC0hoag1HQ2Gx2eh5Yz34%3D&reserved=0> | Instagram <https://www.instagram.com/muskingum_university> | Facebook <https://na01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2Fmuskieadmission&data=02%7C01%7Cccrane%40Itctransco.com%7Cbaf944b17a484fd12b7608d67a257026%7C579de82f6a464bff92cdbf4459fc16cd%7C0%7C0%7C636830698574990353&sdata=a8JIYL0Pji9IE2S%2Bt4SQyfxEKENGPRNbdfxFnf2BZD8%3D&reserved=0> | Twitter <https://na01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2FMuskieAdmission&data=02%7C01%7Cccrane%40Itctransco.com%7Cbaf944b17a484fd12b7608d67a257026%7C579de82f6a464bff92cdbf4459fc16cd%7C0%7C0%7C636830698574990353&sdata=Dkdp8ToP5USLAw221s4%2BSDJzI6abrtGDpDiVqTJqdhY%3D&reserved=0>

  ­ ͏ ‌     ­ ͏ ‌     ­

[
https://my.uofakron.org/f/r/a692c3d7e947efafe10a139d2?%2FdXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPWNyb3NzJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9ZW5yb2xsMzYwJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09ZW1haWwmdXRtX2NvbnRlbnQ9bGVhcm4mdXRtX3Rlcm09aGVhZGVyJnRubnQ9N2FlNTU4NTMtMGFjZC00NWRhLWI0NDktZGE2ZWE4MWM2ZjA1JlVUTV9yY3JkPTBhODAwMjk5LWQ2NzYtNGJhNC05MDc4LWIyMTE4NTBkNmU4YyI7fQ%3D%3D&
]

AN UPCOMING January 31 DEADLINE?
THAT'S NO PROBLEM FOR YOU, Kieran!

That's right. The deadline to apply to The University of Akron [
https://my.uofakron.org/f/r/7a15e0270e30b97964db2716f?%3D%3D&
] will be here on January 31. But I
know you'll be able to beat it.

 

I also know that UA's outstanding academics and welcoming community
can help you shape your future career. So why not get started now and
apply right away [
https://my.uofakron.org/f/r/7a15e0270e30b97964db2716f?%3D%3D&
] or add UA to your list of Common App schools [
https://my.uofakron.org/f/r/02460f556acc439d05578f406?%3D%3D&
]?

 

We've already given you a few perks, including:

* A waived application fee
* Automatic scholarship consideration
* Optional ACT/SAT score submission
* No essay
* A quick admission decision

APPLY TODAY TO UA [
https://my.uofakron.org/f/r/7a15e0270e30b97964db2716f?%3D%3D&
]

APPLY WITH THE COMMON APP [
https://my.uofakron.org/f/r/02460f556acc439d05578f406?%3D%3D&
]

[
https://my.uofakron.org/f/r/3309145f08b017302a20cf495?%3D%3D&
]

Yes, it's true that time can move fast, but I know that you're faster.
Apply now [
https://my.uofakron.org/f/r/7a15e0270e30b97964db2716f?%3D%3D&
] and you'll easily beat the
January 31 deadline to the finish
line. 

  

Sincerely,

.signer-name {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  color: #041e42 !important;
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: 800 !important;
}

Kim Gentile

Director of Admissions

Office of Undergraduate Admissions
277 E. Buchtel Ave.
The University of Akron
Akron, OH 44325-2001

We received your information from
your Appily college research.
